Privacy Policy

SCOPE

This Privacy Policy applies to the end users of the services rendered through the fantarunning .com website and the related mobile application. By using the site and services the User agrees to the Privacy Policy and all revision thereof.

INFORMATION COLLECTED

Fantarunning collects, by itself or through third parties, information/Personal Data from its users upon registration on its website and in connection with the use of its related mobile application. The information collected may include:

First and last name, date of birth, gender, weight, height, state , country, city, e-mail address, miscellaneous workout data (such as : running path, duration and speed , statistics and personal bests).

Failure to provide certain Personal Data may make it impossible for Fantarunning to provide its service.

Location data information (GPs-data) will be collected, use and share automatically, including the real time geographic location of your mobile handset.

Further personal information may be collected from User Generated Content either generated by the User itself or by other Users.

The User assumes responsability for the personal data of third parties published or shared through Fantarunning application and /or Fantarunning website and declares to have the right to communicate or broadcast them thus relieving Fantaruning of all reponsabilities.

Fantarunning may conduct research on its end user’s demographics, interests and behavior based on the personal data and other information provided. This research, so as to better serve and understand fantarunning end users , may be compiled and analyzed on an aggregate basis. Fantarunning may share this aggregated data with its affiliates, agents and business partners. This aggregate information does not identify the end user personally. Fantarunning may also disclose aggregated user statistics in order to describe fantarunning services to current and prospective business partners, and to other third parties for other lawful purposes.

Cookies

A cookie is a small string of information that are placed on the user’s computer and stored by the browser. Any use of cookies, or of other tracking tools, by Fantarunning or by the owners of third parties services used by Fantarunning help to provide a more user-friendly, effective and secure service. A cookie works for users identification and for remembering their preferences, with the only objective to provide the service required by the User itself.

Data Processing

By registering the User explicity agrees that Fantarunning shall have the right to use all authomatically collected personally identifiable information in accordance with this Policy and for purposes of the Fantarunning application and website.

Fantarunning process Personal Data only for the purposes for which it was collected and in accordance with this Policy or any applicable specific privacy notice. The Data processing is carried out using computers and/or IT enabled tool. Appropriate security measures are taken to prevent unauthorized access , disclosure, modification or unauthorized destruction of the data.

Data may be accesible to only a limited number of persons in charge, involved with the operation of the site (administration, sales, marketing, legal, system administrator) or possible external parties( e.g third party technical service providers, hosting providers, IT companies , mail carriers, communications agencies) appointed, if necessary as data processors.

All personal information and User Generated Content are stored and processed, by Fantarunning or by external parties (see above), duly authorized , on servers located within the European Union and more generally in any other possible places where the parties involved with the processing are located.

All Data are kept for the time necessary to provide the service requested by the User, or stated by the purposes outlined in this document. The User can always request that his own data can be suspended or removed.

Fantarunning may also disclose the User Personal Data if required to do so by law and upon request of Public Authorities or in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to comply with a legal obbligation, protect and defend Fantarunning rights or property , act in urgent circumstancies to protect the personal safety of users of the Services or the public, or protect against legal liability.

The User’s Personal Data may be used for operation and maintenance purposes. This Applications and any third party services may collect files that record interaction with this Application (System Logs) or use for this purpose other Personal Data ( such as IP Address).

In addition to the information contained in this privacy policy this Application may provide the User with additional and contextual information concerning particular services or the collection and processing of Personal Data upon request.

The User’s Personal Data may be transferred if Fantarunning is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale in whole or in part.

Enforcement and Changes to Fantarunning Privacy Policy

Fantarunning reserves the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice. Fantarunning strongly recommends to check this page often referrring to the date of the last modification listed at the bottom. If a User objects to any of the changes to the Policy, the User must cease using this Application and can request that his Personal Data be erased. User’s continued use of the services after any changes or revision to this Privacy Policy shall indicate User ‘s agreement with terms and conditions of such revised Privacy Policy.

Exclusion

This Privacy Policy shall not apply to any unsollicited information the User provide to Fantarunning. This includes, but is not limited to information posted by the User to any public areas of Fantarunning web site.

Fantarunning, Users in User Generated Content, third party service providers and advertisers may provide links to other internet sites and/or other resourcers. Since Fantarunning has no control over such sites and resources, Fantarunning is not responsible nor liable for the avaiability, content, advertising, products, services or other materials on or avaiable from such sites or resources. These third party websites may have their own Privacy Policy.

Contact Fantarunning

For any additional question or concerns about this Privacy Policy or information practices please feel free to contact us at info@funtarunning.com
